fields.name: bonsai
fields.description: Trees or shrubs that are trained to grow in a small, shallow pot and are pruned and shaped to resemble a mature tree.

fields.name: cacti
fields.description: Plants that are adapted to dry, desert environments and have thick, fleshy stems and spines.

fields.name: succulents
fields.description: Succulents are plants that store water in their leaves, stems, and roots.

fields.name: house_plants
fields.description: A variety of plants that are well-suited for indoor cultivation

fields.name: carnivorous_plants
fields.description: Plants that capture and digest insects or other small animals.

fields.name: garden_plants
fields.description: A variety of plants that are well-suited for outdoor cultivation in gardens.

fields.name: pots_and_planters
fields.description: A variety of pots and planters for your plants, including indoor and outdoor options.

fields.name: fertilizers_and_pesticides
fields.description: A range of fertilizers and pesticides to help you care for your plants.
